meanings.definition: To pause before saying or doing something.
meanings.sent1: She hesitated before answering the question.
meanings.sent2: He always hesitated before making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The cat hesitated before pouncing on the toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun hesitated before setting behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The student hesitated, unsure of the correct answer.

meanings.sent1: They hesitated to try the new food.
meanings.sent2: I hesitated to speak up in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The dog hesitated to go outside in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her heart hesitated before taking a chance on love.
meanings.sent5: The explorer hesitated at the edge of the cliff, unsure of what lay below.
